long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Onairos extension is an innovative tool that integrates advanced AI/ML models, blockchain technology, and a strong commitment to user privacy to transform your web experience. By connecting with the Onairos web app, the extension empowers users to manage and share their digital identities securely and rewards them for their participation.
To fully utilize the Onairos extension, you must have an active account on the Onairos web app. There's no need for additional software installations. Simply create an account or log in via your browser, and seamlessly connect the extension to Websites and Apps online for a secure, personalized, and rewarding web experience.
